p:
The cH8/1 LAIV expressed the same cH8/1 Cal09 and N1 Cal09 as the cH8/1 IIV but was based on the A/Leningrad/134/17/57 live-attenuated backbone which features a ts and ca phenotype.
45 The cH8/1 LAIV seed virus was rescued at the Center for Disease Control (CDC) under GLP conditions.
46 pDZ plasmids for the virus rescue were cloned at the Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai. GLP-grade PB2, PB1, PA, NP, M and NS segments of A/Leningrad/134/17/57 virus were synthesized (DNA2.0, Newark, CA) from sequences deposited in the Global Initiative for Sharing Influenza Data (GISAID) online database (EPI555079 to EPI555086).
